text: Beauty and the Beast is a musical romantic fantasy movie that was released in 2017. It was directed by Bill Condon and was produced by Walt Disney Pictures. The movie is based on the animated 1991 movie and the fairy tale written by Jeanne-Marie Leprince de Beaumont. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Beauty and the Beast (Disney) Category:2017 musical movies Category:2017 fantasy movies Category:American musical movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:Disney movie remakes Category:Movies set in castles Category:Movies set in France Category:Movies directed by Bill Condon
